welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Holyoke, the charming city known for its rich history, beautiful parks, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and discover all that Holyoke has to offer during your stay. Enjoy your time here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westover ARB/Metropolitan Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Westover ARB/Metropolitan Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and provides various amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights, offering exclusive services for high-end travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The primary terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
